587980.name: Akihabara - Pure Beat
587980.description:
Enjoy the beat of Akihabara in it's purest form! Akihabara - Pure Beat adds an additional gamemode, removing the puzzle and focusing purely on rhythm and timing. Try for a score on the new online leaderboard, get a 100% on each track, or just feel the music flow through you.

Akihabara - Pure Beat features the same electrifying music as Akihabara - Feel the Rhythm, but with all new gameplay.
587980.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
